1: וְיִפְתָּ֣ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Now Jephthah</n> הַגִּלְעָדִ֗י <sup>1569 </sup> <n>the Gileadite</n> הָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> גִּבּ֣וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>was a mighty man</n> חַ֔יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of valour</n> וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and he [was] the son</n> אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>ess</n> זוֹנָ֑ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>commit fornication</n> וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>begat</n> גִּלְעָ֖ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>and Gilead</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִפְתָּֽח׃ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Jephthah</n>
2: וַתֵּ֧לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>bare</n> אֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> גִּלְעָ֛ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>And Gilead's</n> ל֖וֹ בָּנִ֑ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>him sons</n> וַיִּגְדְּל֨וּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>grew up</n> בְֽנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and his wife's</n> וַיְגָרְשׁ֣וּ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>and they thrust out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִפְתָּ֗ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Jephthah</n> וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִנְחַ֣ל <sup>5157 </sup> <n>unto him Thou shalt not inherit</n> בְּבֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָבִ֔ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>in our father's</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>for thou [art] the son</n> אִשָּׁ֥ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>woman</n> אַחֶ֖רֶת <sup>312 </sup> <n>of a strange</n> אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
3: וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <sup>1272 </sup> <n>fled</n> יִפְתָּח֙ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Then Jephthah</n> מִפְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from</n> אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brethren</n> וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2897 </sup> <n>of Tob</n> וַיִּֽתְלַקְּט֤וּ <sup>3950 </sup> <n>and there were gathered</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יִפְתָּח֙ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>to Jephthah</n> אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> רֵיקִ֔ים <sup>7386 </sup> <n>vain</n> וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> פ
4: וַיְהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מִיָּמִ֑ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in process of time</n> וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>made war</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>that the children</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n>
5: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> נִלְחֲמ֥וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>made war</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And it was so that when the children</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>against</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>against Israel</n> וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>the elders</n> גִלְעָ֔ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> לָקַ֥חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to fetch</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִפְתָּ֖ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Jephthah</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2897 </sup> <n>of Tob</n>
6: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> לְיִפְתָּ֔ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>unto Jephthah</n> לְכָ֕ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְהָיִ֥יתָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָּ֖נוּ לְקָצִ֑ין <sup>7101 </sup> <n>and be our captain</n> וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <sup>3898 </sup> <n>that we may fight</n> בִּבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>with the children</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n>
7: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יִפְתָּח֙ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>And Jephthah</n> לְזִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> גִלְעָ֔ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> הֲלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> שְׂנֵאתֶ֣ם <sup>8130 </sup> <n>Did not ye hate</n> אוֹתִ֔י <sup>853 </sup> וַתְּגָרְשׁ֖וּנִי <sup>1644 </sup> <n>me and expel</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>court</n> אָבִ֑י <sup>1 </sup> <n>me out of my father's</n> וּמַדּ֜וּעַ <sup>4069 </sup> <n>have you</n> בָּאתֶ֤ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> עַ֔תָּה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צַ֥ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>adversary</n> לָכֶֽם׃
8: וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> זִקְנֵ֨י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And the elders</n> גִלְעָ֜ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִפְתָּ֗ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>unto Jephthah</n> לָכֵן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>have now</n> שַׁ֣בְנוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Therefore we turn again</n> אֵלֶ֔יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to thee now that thou mayest go</n> עִמָּ֔נוּ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>us</n> וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֖ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>with us and fight</n> בִּבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>against the children</n> עַמּ֑וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וְהָיִ֤יתָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and become</n> לָּ֙נוּ֙ לְרֹ֔אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>and be our head</n> לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>over all the inhabitants</n> גִלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n>
9: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יִפְתָּ֜ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>And Jephthah</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> גִלְעָ֗ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> מְשִׁיבִ֨ים <sup>7725 </sup> <n>If ye bring me home again</n> אַתֶּ֤ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אוֹתִי֙ <sup>853 </sup> לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> בִּבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>against the children</n> עַמּ֔וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וְנָתַ֧ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>deliver</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> אוֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> לְפָנָ֑י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>them before</n> אָנֹכִ֕י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֖ם לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>band</n>
10: וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> זִקְנֵֽי־ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>And the elders</n> גִלְעָ֖ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִפְתָּ֑ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>unto Jephthah</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>be witness</n> בֵּֽינוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> כִדְבָרְךָ֖ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>not so according to thy words</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>between us if we do</n>
11: וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> יִפְתָּח֙ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Then Jephthah</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>with the elders</n> גִלְעָ֔ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>of Gilead</n> וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>made</n> הָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> אוֹת֛וֹ <sup>853 </sup> עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> לְרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>him head</n> וּלְקָצִ֑ין <sup>7101 </sup> <n>and captain</n> וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>uttered</n> יִפְתָּ֧ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>over them and Jephthah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> דְּבָרָ֛יו <sup>1697 </sup> <n>all his words</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <sup>4709 </sup> <n>in Mizpeh</n> פ
12: וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> יִפְתָּח֙ <sup>3316 </sup> <n>And Jephthah</n> מַלְאָכִ֔ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>messengers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> לִּ֣י וָלָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> בָ֥אתָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>What hast thou to do with me that thou art come</n> אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>against me to fight</n> בְּאַרְצִֽי׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>common</n>
13: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>answered</n> מֶ֨לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּ֜וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <sup>4397 </sup> <n>unto the messengers</n> יִפְתָּ֗ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>of Jephthah</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לָקַ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took away</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Because Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַרְצִי֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>my land</n> בַּעֲלוֹת֣וֹ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>when they came up</n> מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> מֵאַרְנ֥וֹן <sup>769 </sup> <n>from Arnon</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> הַיַּבֹּ֖ק <sup>2999 </sup> <n>even unto Jabbok</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>and unto Jordan</n> וְעַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> הָשִׁ֥יבָה <sup>7725 </sup> <n>now therefore restore those [lands] again</n> אֶתְהֶ֖ן <sup>853 </sup> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peaceably</n>
14: וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>again</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>But</n> יִפְתָּ֑ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>And Jephthah</n> וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> מַלְאָכִ֔ים <sup>4397 </sup> <n>messengers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n>
15: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> ל֔וֹ כֹּ֖ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him Thus saith</n> יִפְתָּ֑ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>Jephthah</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> לָקַ֤ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took not away</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> מוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>nor the land</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n>
16: כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בַּעֲלוֹתָ֣ם <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>from Egypt</n> וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>But when Israel</n> בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>through the wilderness</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> יַם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> ס֔וּף <sup>5488 </sup> <n>unto the Red</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and came</n> קָדֵֽשָׁה׃ <sup>6946 </sup> <n>to Kadesh</n>
17: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Then Israel</n> מַלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>messengers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶלֶךְ֩ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> אֱד֨וֹם ׀ <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> לֵאמֹ֜ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אֶעְבְּרָה־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Let me I pray thee pass through</n> נָּ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <sup>776 </sup> <n>thy land</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁמַע֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>would not hearken</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>but the king</n> אֱד֔וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> וְגַ֨ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֧לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> מוֹאָ֛ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n> שָׁלַ֖ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[thereto] And in like manner they sent</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָבָ֑ה <sup>14 </sup> <n>but he would</n> וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>abode</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>not [consent] and Israel</n> בְּקָדֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>6946 </sup> <n>in Kadesh</n>

34: וַיָּבֹ֨א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יִפְתָּ֣ח <sup>3316 </sup> <n>And Jephthah</n> הַמִּצְפָּה֮ <sup>4709 </sup> <n>to Mizpeh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> בֵּיתוֹ֒ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto his house</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> בִתּוֹ֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and behold his daughter</n> יֹצֵ֣את <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> בְתֻפִּ֖ים <sup>8596 </sup> <n>him with timbrels</n> וּבִמְחֹל֑וֹת <sup>4246 </sup> <n>and with dances</n> וְרַק֙ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> הִ֣יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>now she</n> יְחִידָ֔ה <sup>3173 </sup> <n>and she [was his] only child</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>had</n> ל֥וֹ מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>besides</n> בֵּ֖ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>beside her he had neither son</n> אוֹ־ <sup>176 </sup> <n>nor</n> בַֽת׃ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughter</n>
